txt.en: '[placeholder]! I am disappointed. If we are to unravel the mystery of this wood, we must find more tokens... yet you managed to lose the pick-axe I gave you? Very well, let me see if one of these Rohirrim brought a pick with him into these wilds.'
'We are fortunate. These good people did indeed have a pick-axe among their goods. Go now and complete your task!'
When Saeradan asked you to search near the Mustering Tree and the Tree of Tribute for signs of other evil tokens, he gave you a pick-axe with which to dig them up... which you promptly lost.
Talk to Saeradan to receive the pick-axe
Saeradan is at the Rohirrim scout-camp in the Gravenwood of Dunland.\n\nSaeradan has spoken with the Rohirrim and is waiting upon you.
Use the pick-axe in your inventory to accept the quest Seeking a Solution, then complete it
The Tree of Tribute lies to the west of the Rohirrim Scout-camp.\n\nYou should return to the Tree of Tribute and complete the task Saeradan set before you.
